video.title: Webhooks for Beginners - Full Course
video.description:
What are webhooks? Webhooks allow different web applications and services to communicate with each other. In this course for beginners, you will learn everything you need to know about webhooks. You will learn to implement webhooks with and without code.

💻 Teacher notes and code: https://github.com/twiliodeved/webhooks-course

✏️ Course developed by Craig Dennis, who is a Developer Educator at Twilio.

⭐️ Course Contents ⭐️
Unit 1  - Integration
⌨️ Video 1 - Welcome (00:00:00)
⌨️ Video 2 - Defining Events, Handlers, and Hooks (00:04:51)
⌨️ Video 3 - Lightbulb moment (00:09:12)
⌨️ Video 4 - Finding Inspiration (00:17:11)
Unit 2 - Capturing Data from a Webhook
⌨️ Video 1 - Diving into Webhooks (00:23:33)
⌨️ Video 2 - Explore the Request (00:28:28)
⌨️ Video 3 - Using the Data (00:37:34)
⌨️ Video 4 - Developing Locally (00:46:32)
⌨️ Video 5 - Opening a Tunnel (00:57:34)
⌨️ Video 6 - Serverless (01:17:17)
Unit 3 - Hooking it altogether 
⌨️ Video 1 - Introducing the projects (01:34:52)
⌨️ Video 2 - Text Affirmation (01:38:33)
⌨️ Video 3 - Setting up the flow (01:44:45)
⌨️ Video 4 - Handle things locally (01:56:34)
⌨️ Video 5 - Deploying your serverless function (02:11:46)
⌨️ Video 6 - That’s a Wrap (02:22:53)

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.org

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://freecodecamp.org/news

replies.text: @Craig Dennis Thank you a lot for your information.  I am not certain at all if what you are saying will work for what I am trying to accomplish.  YOU ARE CORRECT, I do not need their payment information, I just need to know that their payment was confirmed But I dont know how a TOKEN is going to help me.  What am I supposed to do with a token and how would I get that token ?   I plan on processing hundreds to thousands payments a day, I can not manually enter token information to complete their data process that would defeat the entire premise of an automated system.  ( QUESTION )  If a person BUYS a Product when they press SUBMIT PAYMENT their product is not automatically sent until payment is confirmed I should think this would be the same basic function right ???

replies.author: Craig Dennis
replies.text:
Hi there! I totally see your frustration and we've all been there! I think you're looking for something like Stripe checkout https://stripe.com/docs/payments/checkout

This is a flow where once completed you will get confirmation of payment at your site in the form of a payment token. You don't want to really store the payment information, you just want to know you got paid. You store the token that you can use either in Stripe's console or via their API.

When you set this up you provide a URL to go to on success. Stripe will submit information back to you via a form post. In a way this is very similar to a webhooks it is just flow based and synchronous.

Hope that helps!
